title: RCCG Newspring Water Baptism Ceremony
description:
Join us for an unforgettable spiritual celebration at the RCCG Newspring Water Baptism Ceremony. This event is a landmark occasion where new believers step forward in obedience to Christ's command, declaring their faith in a public setting. The ceremony begins at 9:30 AM with a time of heartfelt worship led by our praise band, setting a reverent atmosphere as we prepare our hearts for the ordinance.

Candidates will gather briefly for a pre-baptism orientation and prayer at 10:00 AM in the Fellowship Hall. During this time, our pastoral team will share a teaching on the biblical significance of baptism—examining passages from Romans 6, Matthew 28, and Acts 2. Each candidate will then share a short personal testimony of faith, offering a glimpse into the transformative work of God in their lives.

At 11:00 AM, we will transition to the baptismal pool located at the east wing of the sanctuary. Family and friends are encouraged to assemble in the seating gallery, where an elevated platform provides an unobstructed view of the immersive ritual. Candidates should come prepared with a white baptismal robe, a change of dry clothes, and a towel. For modesty and convenience, robes are available at no extra cost upon request.

Immediately following the immersion, we will join together in a time of celebratory fellowship, featuring light refreshments and opportunities for photographs. Our Media Team will be on hand to capture these precious moments—feel free to gather for group photos against the backdrop of the baptismal pool.

Please note: Registration is required to participate. You must have completed the New Believers' Foundations course, held weekly on Tuesdays at 5:00 PM, before being eligible for baptism. Registration closes on May 5, 2025, at 11:59 PM. Late registrations will not be accepted.

For inquiries or to request transportation assistance, contact our Church Office via email at info@newspringchurch.org or call +234 81 2345 6789. We look forward to celebrating this pivotal step of faith with you and rejoice in the new life we have in Christ!
